query.description: Filter teams by a search term in their name. This performs a partial match.
The column to sort teams by. Allowed values: `title`, `description`, `priority_levels`, `status`, `deadline_at`, `started_at`, `completed_at`, `created_at`. Defaults to `created_at`.
The direction to sort teams by. Allowed values: `asc`, `desc`. Defaults to `desc`.
